description: You can move more quickly than most, resulting in a 15% speed bonus on sure footing.
A photophore has grown from your head, you can make it glow softly.  This will make you very visible in the dark, ideal to attract a partner during mating season.
Your can make your photophore glow brightly.
Your hearing is better than average, and you can hear distant sounds more easily.
Your not sure the shape of your ears are helping, but regardless you have become very sensitive to sounds.
You are accustomed to being exposed to the elements.  This decreases morale penalties for being wet.
You're skilled at clearing obstacles; terrain like railings or counters are as easy for you to move on as solid ground.

Whether due to exercise and good diet, or due to a natural propensity to physical endurance, you tire due to physical exertion much less readily than others.  Your maximum stamina is 25% higher than usual.
Your body's efficiency is like that of a tiny furnace, increasing your maximum stamina by 40%.
You're just generally quick!  You get a 10% bonus to action points.
Nothing gets you down!  You savor the joys of life, ignore its hardships, and are generally happier than most people.
You heal faster when sleeping and will even recover a small amount of HP when not sleeping.
Your metabolism is a little slower, and you require less food than most.
You have always been able to fall asleep easily, even when sleeping in less than ideal circumstances.
Your body's demanding energy needs mean you can fall asleep just about anywhere.
You have a high tolerance for pain.
You possess natural night vision, and can see further in the dark than most.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.
Your system is rather tolerant of poisons and toxins, and most will affect you less.
You're a quick reader, and can get through books a lot faster than most.
The bottoms of your feet are tough and you are accustomed to going barefoot.  You receive no movement penalty for not wearing shoes.
It takes a lot to bring you down!  You get a 20% bonus to all hit points.
You can shrug off almost anything!  You get a 30% bonus to all hit points.
Nothing can break you!  You get a 40% bonus to all hit points.
Your skin is tough.  Cutting and bash damage is slightly reduced for you.  There's a small chance you don't cut yourself on sharp terrain.
You pack things very efficiently!  You can retrieve things from containers 10% faster.
You are capable of carrying far more than someone with similar strength could.  Your maximum weight carried is increased by 35%.
You have a flexible mind, allowing you to learn skills much faster than others.  Note that this only applies to real-world experience, not to skill gain from other sources like books.

You've been taught proper table manners from your early childhood on.  Now you can't even think about eating without a table or not taking your time.  Eating without it frustrates you, but eating like a civilized person gives you a bigger morale bonus.
You are less likely to throw up from food poisoning, alcohol, etc.  If you throw up nevertheless, you won't suffer a residual nausea.
//: nope.  This does NOT lead to EATPOISON.  Stomach problems are part of the GI upgrades--one advantage to not having Robust Genetics.

description: You have an exceptional memory, and find it easy to remember things.  Your skills will erode slightly slower than usual, and you can remember more terrain.
While you're not any better at melee combat, you are better at recovering from a miss, and will be able to attempt another strike faster.

You've always felt that there is more to the world than we can see.  Whether driven by religious beliefs or philosophical interest, you find great inspiration in studying holy texts and experiencing mystical things.
You can handle intoxicants well.  Their effects clear up more quickly for you.

You eat faster, and can eat and drink more, than anyone else!  You also enjoy food more; delicious food is better for your morale, and you don't mind unsavory meals as much.  Activate to skip prompt for overeating.
There's nothing quite like the smell of a good book!  Books are more fun (or less boring) for you!
Whether due to a lifetime of exposure or through simple willpower, it's harder for you to become addicted to substances, and easier to rid yourself of these addictions.
Peaceful animals will not run away from you, and even aggressive animals are less likely to attack.  This only applies to natural animals such as woodland creatures.
Something about your presence is calming to animals, and they will treat you with innate trust.  This only applies to natural animals such as woodland creatures.
There's something about you that creatures find frightening, and they are more likely to try to flee.
It's very unlikely that you will catch ambient diseases like a cold or the flu.
If you are in a very dangerous situation, you may experience a temporary rush which increases your speed and strength significantly.
You need less sleep than the average person.
You get to see your exact amount of HP remaining and health, instead of only having a vague idea of whether you're in good condition or not.
Although you still suffer the negative effects of pain, it also brings a unique pleasure to you.
You have a unique history with stimulants (like coffee or amphetamines).  You can tolerate a lot more of them without overdosing, but if you indulge too much, you start seeing things…
Practicality is far less important than style.  Your morale is improved by wearing fashionable and attractive clothing.
You make less noise while walking.  You're also less likely to set off traps.
You have a very strong genetic base.  If you mutate, the odds that the mutation will be beneficial are greatly increased.

//: Can't change the ID as that breaks save-compatibility.
description: You're an excellent navigator and your ability to spot distant landmarks is unmatched.  Your sight radius on the overmap extends beyond the normal range.
Focal brain damage has rendered you incapable of recognizing landmarks and orienting yourself in your surroundings, severely crippling your sight radius on the overmap.
For your whole life you've been forbidden from indulging in your peculiar tastes.  Now the world's ended, and you'll be damned if anyone is going to tell you that you can't eat people.
You'd never eat people, but these things that look vaguely human from elsewhere are definitely not people.
You don't experience guilt like others do.  Even when you know your actions are wrong, you just don't care.
You derive enjoyment from killing things.  Putting end to life seem to spark some dark satisfaction and thrill, and you crave it every moment.
You have received some martial arts training at a local dojo.  You start with your choice of Karate, Judo, Aikido, Tai Chi, Taekwondo, or Pankration.
You have taken some self-defense classes at a nearby gym.  You start with your choice of Capoeira, Krav Maga, Muay Thai, Ninjutsu, Wing Chun, or Zui Quan.
You have studied the arts of the Shaolin monks.  You start with one of the five animal fighting styles: Tiger, Crane, Leopard, Snake, or Dragon.
You have practiced fighting with weapons.  You start with your choice of Eskrima, Fencing, Fior Di Battaglia, Medieval Swordsmanship, Niten Ichi-Ryu, Pentjak Silat, or Sōjutsu.
You were an avid fencer, starting with foil and moving onto saber, then épée.  You competed nationally and dabbled with some of the historical fencing weapons afforded by HEMA's popularity.
Your scent is quite weak.  Animals that track your scent will do so with more difficulty.
You have no qualms about bending the truth, and have practically no tells.  Telling lies and otherwise bluffing will be much easier for you.
You lost an awful lot of weight before Cataclysm.  Whatever the reason, your skeletal figure is now an extra burden, when food is not at hand's reach.  You need to gain weight or die trying.
You gained an awful lot of weight before Cataclysm.  Whatever the reason, your bloated figure is now an extra burden, when mobility is a key to survival.  You need to go on a diet or die trying.
You are a sight to behold.  People who care about such things will react more kindly to you.
Whether due to injury or age, your knees aren't particularly strong or flexible.  Moving over rough terrain will slow you down more than normal.

Whether due to lack of exercise and poor diet, or due to a natural disinclination to physical endurance, you tire due to physical exertion much more readily than others.  Your maximum stamina is 25% lower than usual.
Without glasses, your seeing radius is severely reduced!  However, you are guaranteed to start with a pair of glasses.
You heal a little slower than most; sleeping will heal less HP.
Your health recovery through sleeping is severely impaired and causes you to recover only a third of usual HP.
You recover barely any health through sleeping - it will heal only one tenth of usual HP.

Without reading glasses, you are unable to read anything, and take penalties on melee accuracy and electronics/tailoring crafting.  However, you are guaranteed to start with a pair of reading glasses.
You're quite the heavy sleeper.  Noises are unlikely to wake you up.
You need sleep more often, but still spend most of your time awake.
You will occasionally need to use an inhaler, or else suffer severe physical limitations.  However, you are guaranteed to start with an inhaler.
You simply cannot carry as much as people with a similar strength could.  Your maximum weight carried is reduced by 35%.
Things just keep getting you down.  You tend to be unhappy, and it takes some doing to cheer you up.
You are terrible at organizing and storing your possessions.  You retrieve things from containers 10% slower.
You never learned to read!  Books and computers are off-limits to you.
Your hearing is poor, and you may not hear quiet or far-off noises.
You're not able to hear anything, and as such you're not able to talk to NPCs.
You are slow to grasp new ideas and thus learn things more slowly than others.  Note that this only applies to real-world experience, not to skill gain from other sources like books.
You have a hard time falling asleep, even under the best circumstances!
You have problems with eating meat.  It's possible for you to eat it, but you will suffer morale penalties and obtain less nutrition from it.
Your skin is fragile.  Cutting and bash damage is slightly increased for you.
You have problems with eating vegetables.  It's possible for you to eat them, but you will suffer morale penalties and obtain less nutrition from them.
Reading is for nerds!  Boring books are more boring, and you can't have fun by reading books.
You despise eating fruits.  It's possible for you to eat them, but you will suffer morale penalties and obtain less nutrition from them.
You, like 75 percent of the world, cannot tolerate milk or milk based products.  It's possible for you to eat them, but you will suffer morale penalties and obtain less nutrition from them.
Something in those heavily processed foods doesn't agree with you.  It's possible for you to eat them, but you will suffer morale penalties and obtain less nutrition from them.

You have a rare allergy that prevents you from eating most types of grains such as wheat or oats.  It's possible for you to eat them, but you will suffer morale penalties and obtain less nutrition from them.
You have a soft spot for processed foods, and gain a morale bonus from eating them.
You *adore* the taste of junk food, and find it preferable to everything else!
Your head can't take much abuse.  Its maximum HP is 20% lower than usual.
You have a hard time remembering things.  Your skills will erode slightly faster than usual, and you can remember less terrain.
Alcohol and drugs go straight to your head.  You suffer the negative effects of these for longer.
It's easier for you to become addicted to substances, and harder to rid yourself of these addictions.
Unimplemented.  To be removed after 0.F. to preserve save compatibility.
Your scent is particularly strong.  It's not offensive to humans, but animals that track your scent will do so more easily.

You suffer from a minor chemical imbalance, whether mental or physical.  Minor changes to your internal chemistry will manifest themselves on occasion, such as hunger, sleepiness, narcotic effects, etc.
Most animals don't like you, and aggressive animals are more likely to attack you.  This only applies to natural animals such as woodland creatures.
Natural animals like dogs and wolves see you as prey, and are liable to attack you on sight.
You're a slow reader, and it takes you longer to get through books than most.
You will periodically suffer from delusions, ranging from minor effects to full visual hallucinations.  Some of these effects may be controlled through the use of Thorazine.
You randomly fall asleep without any reason.
You make more noise while walking.  You're also more likely to set off traps.
During moments of great stress or under the effects of stimulants, you may find your hands shaking uncontrollably, severely reducing your Dexterity.
You don't feel right unless you're carrying as much as you can.  You suffer morale penalties for carrying less than maximum volume (weight is ignored).  Xanax can help control this anxiety.

You tend to specialize in one skill and be poor at all others.  You advance at half speed in all skills except your best one.  Note that combining this with Fast Learner will come out to a slower rate of learning for all skills.
You don't like thinking about violence.  Your combat skills advance much slower than usual, and you feel more guilt about killing.
Your morale will shift up and down at random, often dramatically.
You can't move as fast as most, resulting in a 15% speed penalty on flat ground.
You are more likely to throw up from food poisoning, alcohol, etc.
You are badly allergic to wool, and cannot wear any clothing made of the substance.
When you try to tell a lie, you blush, stammer, and get all shifty-eyed.  Telling lies and otherwise bluffing will be much more difficult for you.
You're not much to look at.  People who care about such things will react poorly to you.
You lack skin pigmentation due to a genetic problem.  You sunburn extremely easily, and typically use an umbrella and sunglasses when going out in the sun.
Your body can't take much abuse.  Its maximum HP is 25% lower than usual and you heal slightly slower.  Stacks with Glass Jaw.
Your body breaks very easily.  Its maximum HP is 50% lower than usual and you heal slower.  Stacks with Glass Jaw.
Your body is extremely fragile.  Its maximum HP is 75% lower than usual and you heal much slower.  Stacks with Glass Jaw.
The events of the Cataclysm have damaged your DNA beyond repair.  You mutate frequently, and all mutations you receive (from any source) are negative.
Your skin is slightly rough.  This has no gameplay effect.
You can see incredibly well in the dark!  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.
You can see in pitch blackness as if you were wearing night-vision goggles.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.
Your eyes still bulge, yet your pupils look different somehow.  Water doesn't seem to cause any trouble at all, though.
Your brain has caught up with your eyes.  You can see much better in the dark, but sunlight seems much brighter now.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.
Your eyes have turned… green.  It's tough to tell the exact shade as it seems to shift.  The effect is… pleasant.
The shadows don't seem as dark now.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.
You have great low-light vision now, though that doesn't allow you to perform fine tasks such as crafting and reading in darkness.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.
Your eyes have mutated, now having a slitted pupil and glittering in light, much like those of cats.  This is visually striking, but it isn't helping you see at night.
Your optic nerves and brain caught up with your eyes.  Now you can see pretty well at night.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.
Your visual processing has shifted: though you can see better in the dark, you're nearsighted in the light.  Maybe glasses would help.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.
Your vision has become particularly acute: you suspect you could pick out zombies much farther away.  Perception +4.
Your eyes have mutated to pick up radiation in the infrared spectrum.
Your eyes have mutated, with a brilliant iris and slitted pupil similar to that of a lizard.  This is visually striking, but doesn't seem to affect your vision.
Your optic nerves and brain have mutated to catch up with your eyes, allowing you to see in the infrared spectrum.
Your flesh regenerates slowly, and you will regain HP even when not sleeping.
Your flesh regenerates from wounds incredibly quickly.
Your broken limbs mend themselves without significant difficulty.
You don't sleep often.  But when you do, you need very little of it.
You defend the realm all night and all day.
Your teeth have grown into two-inch-long fangs, allowing you to make an extra attack when conditions favor it.
Your big teeth have grown in.  Folks had best show some more respect.

attacks.attack_text_u: You bite into %s with your ratlike incisors

description: You have a set of clear lenses which lower over your eyes while underwater, allowing you to see as though you were wearing goggles.  Slightly decreases wet penalties.
You've grown a set of gills in your neck, allowing you to breathe underwater.  Slightly increases wet benefits.
You've grown a set of gills, running from your neck up behind your ears.  They allow you to breathe underwater and slightly increase wet benefits.
We have begun adapting local physiology to Mycus physical structure, greatly reducing wet effects.

We have spliced the dense, amphibole fibers from Mycus core towers with the resilient, adaptive flesh of local physiology.  This reduces our speed by a moderate amount, but provides powerful armor across our body, nullifies wet effects, and provides complete protection from fire.

Local physiology has been fully incorporated with that of Mycus silicate fibers.  In addition to benefits conferred by previous developments, we may join with Mycus fibers beneath us - sleeping on top of fungal areas places us into a dormant state, which spreads spores around us as we sleep and revitalizes our body much more quickly than regular sleep.
A set of flexible green scales has grown to cover your body, acting as natural armor.  Somewhat reduces wet effects.

A set of heavy green scales has grown to cover your body, acting as natural armor.  While difficult to penetrate, it also limits your flexibility, resulting in a -2 penalty to Dexterity.  Greatly reduces wet effects.
A set of very flexible and slick scales has grown to cover your body.  These act as weak natural armor, improve your ability to swim, and make you difficult to grab.  Mostly reduces wet effects.
Your bones are very light.  This enables you to move and attack 10% faster, but also reduces your carrying weight by 20% and makes bashing attacks hurt a little more.
Iridescent feathers have grown to cover your entire body, providing a marginal protection against attacks and minor protection from cold.  They also provide a natural waterproofing.
You shan't need to migrate south with your layer of down.  It's even better with no apes around to kill you for it!
Light fur has grown to cover your entire body, providing slight protection from cold.
Thick black fur has grown to cover your entire body, providing a marginal protection against attacks, and considerable protection from cold.
Your fur has grown out and thickened, providing noticeable protection from attacks as well as considerable insulation.
Dense gray fur has grown to cover your entire body, providing a marginal protection against attacks, and considerable protection from cold.
You've grown sleek brown fur, providing some protection from cold.
Your fur has grown out significantly around your cheeks and neck.  It provides minor protection against attacks.
Your epidermis has turned into a thin, flexible layer of chitin.  It provides minor protection from cutting wounds.  Slightly reduces wet effects.

You've grown a chitin exoskeleton, much like that of an insect.  It provides considerable physical protection, and make your punches hit a little harder but reduces your Dexterity by 1.  Somewhat reduces wet effects.

You've grown a chitin exoskeleton made of thick, stiff plates.  It provides excellent physical protection, make your punches hit harder but reduces your Dexterity by 1 and encumbers all body parts but your eyes and mouth.  Greatly reduces wet effects.
You've developed some sort of hair growing out of your chitin.  It's a bit warmer than not having hair.
Your chitin hair has thickened and spread across your body.  It provides minor warmth and helps you sense nearby vibrations.
Your exoskeleton has hardened considerably--restricting movement, granted--and boasts a fine coat of hairs that put feline whiskers to shame.

Significant amounts of your hairs have loosened.  If some creature tries to attack you, your assailant is quite likely to get fine, bristly chitin in an irritating spot; it doesn't carry your venom but it will be distracting.
Your skin is covered with fine spines.  Whenever an unarmed opponent strikes a part of your body that is not covered by clothing, they will receive moderate damage.
Your body is covered with large quills.  Whenever an unarmed opponent strikes a part of your body that is not covered by clothing, they will receive significant damage.
Some of the quills on your arms have become quite loose.  By flinging your arms, you can fire off these quills as projectiles.

ranged_mutation.message: You fire off some of your quills.

description: Your skin is light green and has a slightly woody quality to it.  This provides a weak armor, and helps you retain moisture, resulting in less thirst.  Greatly decreases wet penalties.
Your skin is coated in a light bark, like that of a tree.  This provides resistance to cutting damage and minor protection from fire.  Greatly reduces wet effects.

Your skin is covered in small, woody thorns.  Whenever an unarmed opponent strikes a part of your body that is not covered by clothing, they will receive minor damage.  Your punches may also deal extra damage.

All the hair on your body has turned to long, grass-like leaves.  Apart from being physically striking, these provide you with a minor amount of nutrition while in sunlight when your head is uncovered.  Slightly reduces wet effects.

Your leaves have grown in size and prominence, with additional leaves sprouting along your arms.  While your arms and head are uncovered, you will photosynthesize additional nutrients while in sunlight.  Reduces wet effects.

You leaves are vibrant, large, and green, and have become a major source of nutrition for your body.  Whenever your arms and head are uncovered you will gain a large amount of nutrition by standing in the sunlight.  Reduces wet effects.
You body has begun moving nutrients via the evaporation of water.  This increases your thirst when it's hot, but reduces it when it's cold.
You've started blooming where your scalp used to be.  Your blossoms have a pleasant aroma, are visually striking, and are quite sensitive.
The top of your head is blooming with rosebuds.  They're eye catching, and have a strong fragrance that makes you pleasant to be around.
We have developed local spore sacs.  The Mycus must grow.

Local organisms seem to regard open spore-dispersal as a danger, and attack the Mycus.  Accordingly our local spore sacs remain quiescent, until local guidance determines that it is safe to germinate.  Rapid development taxes local nutrient reserves but ensures swift and effective growth.
We have developed local blossoms.  The Mycus must grow.

Local organisms seem to regard open spore-dispersal as a danger, and attack the Mycus.  Accordingly our local blossoms remain quiescent, until local guidance determines that it is safe to germinate.  Rapid development taxes local nutrient reserves but ensures swift and effective growth.

Local spore sacs and blossoms have merged into a single, symbiotic form.  Acting as one, they germinate together to cement rapid growth across a large area according to local guidance.  The Mycus must grow.
Your fingernails are long and sharp.  If you aren't wearing gloves, your unarmed attacks deal a minor amount of cutting damage.
You have claws on the ends of your fingers.  If you aren't wearing gloves, your unarmed attacks deal a minor amount of cutting damage.
Your claws have grown tougher and slightly gnarled.
Your paws are bone, muscle, and claw with a thin layer of skin and fur.  They might as well be made of stainless steel.
You have claws on the ends of your fingers, and can extend or retract them as desired.  Gloves will still get in the way, though.
Sharp claws are exten from the end of your fingers.
Your upper tentacles have grown large, hook-barbed rakes on the ends.  They're quite vicious, but really aren't suited for fine manipulation.

name: Ink glands
description: Several ink glands have grown onto your torso.  They can be used to spray defensive ink and blind an attacker in an emergency, as long as the torso isn't covered.
Your index fingers have grown into huge talons.  After a bit of practice, you find that this does not affect your dexterity, but allows for a deadly unarmed attack.  They also prevent wearing gloves.
Your system has adapted to radiation.  While irradiated, you will actually heal slowly, converting the radiation into hit points.
Ever since you ate that Marloss berry, you can't get its scent out of your nose, and you have a strong desire to try some seeds and… sap?
Ever since you ate that Marloss seed, you can't get its taste off of your tongue, and you have a strong desire to try some berries and… sap?
Ever since you ate that Marloss jelly, you can't stop thinking of it, and you have a strong desire to eat some seeds and berries.
Ever since you had that life-threatening reaction to that Marloss junk, you can't bear the thought of ever eating it again!
Ever since you had that life-threatening reaction to those mutagen and purifier things, you can't bear the thought of ever using them again!
Your body produces low-level pheromones, identifying you as a friend to many species of insects.  Insects will attack you much less.
Your body produces low-level pheromones which put mammals at ease.  They will be less likely to attack or flee from you.
Your body is simply immune to diseases.  You will never catch an ambient disease.
Your immune system is particularly good at resisting infections.  You have an increased chance for bad wounds and infections to heal on their own, and only suffer reduced penalties from them.
Your bloodstream has developed antibiotic properties.  Your wounds will never become infected.

We have synchronized our local physiology with that of the Mycus.  Any spores we may encounter will not attempt to germinate inside the local system, and we may traverse Mycus biospheres easily, as native bioforms shift shape to accommodate us.
Your body is unusually inhospitable to parasitic lifeforms.  You will never become infested with internal parasites.
Your body produces a potent venom.  Cutting or stabbing attacks from mutations have a chance to poison your target.
Your venom has become particularly strong.  You're confident that your bites or other cutting/stabbing natural attacks will take your target down quickly.
The skin on your hands is a mucous membrane and produces a thick, acrid slime.  Attacks using your hand will cause minor acid damage.  Slightly increases wet benefits.
Your limbs seem to have a little more 'give' to them.  +1 Dexterity.
Your limbs are significantly more flexible than any pathetic human arm or leg.  +3 Dexterity, -2 Strength.
Your pseudopod-like limbs can fit into anything!  +4 Dexterity, -4 Strength.
Your eyes are compound, like those of an insect.  This increases your Perception by 2 so long as you aren't wearing eyewear.
The bottoms of your feet are strongly padded.  You receive no movement penalty for not wearing shoes, and even receive a 10% bonus when moving barefoot.
You have grown large, curved, and wickedly sharp talons in place of your big toes.  Fortunately, they don't get in the way of your movement.  Unfortunately, they do prevent wearing footgear.

Your feet have fused into hooves.  This allows kicking attacks to do much more damage, provides natural armor, and removes the need to wear shoes; however, you cannot wear shoes of any kind.  Reduces wet effects.
So it's fermented?  Whatever, it's still good drinking.  You've developed the ability to metabolize alcohol as a food source.
The aches and pains of living underground don't bother you as much.
Your frame has adapted for life in confined spaces.  You seem a little shorter and bulkier, trading muscle mass for mobility.  (+2 Strength, -2 Dexterity)
Your digestive system is specialized to allow you to consume decaying material.  You can eat rotten food, albeit for less nutrition than usual.
You prefer to sustain yourself using your roots and direct nutrient extraction/synthesis.  You can still consume 'food', though, if you have to: you merely prefer it aged a little.
You seem to get full faster now, and food goes through you more rapidly as well.

We have streamlined our nutritional requirements.  We rely on the Mycus for sustenance, as it relies on us.  We may locate sources of sustenance within the close proximity of Mycus core towers, and in forested areas that the Mycus has grown into.
Your digestive system is capable of digesting cellulose and other rough plant material.  You can eat underbrush and shrubs by activating this, standing over your target, and pressing E.
You're accustomed to eating plants directly, and can get nutrition from grass as well as underbrush and shrubs.  Eat either one by activating this, standing over your target, and pressing E.
Your guts have developed the ability to handle poisonous food.  Mostly.
//: Yes, you eventually got over the massive digestive upset.  Mutations aren't easy on a system!

description: Eating rotting, long-dead flesh is good for the struggle, and safe--if still completely unappealing--for you.
Between your claws and teeth, you can tunnel through just about anything.
Your fangs have grown extremely large and incredibly sharp.  They make it impossible to wear mouthgear and difficult to eat… but leave nasty wounds when you bite.

attacks.attack_text_u: You tear into %s with your saber teeth
attacks.attack_text_npc: %1$s tears into %2$s with their saber teeth

description: You metabolize nutrients so rapidly that you can convert food directly into useful tissue.  Excess nutrition will convert to HP, rather than being wasted.  Activate to skip prompt for overeating.
You have a pair of small horns on your head.  They allow you to make a weak piercing headbutt attack.
You have a pair of large curled horns, like those of a ram.  They allow you to make a strong bashing headbutt attack, but prevent wearing any headwear.

attacks.attack_text_u: You headbutt %s with your curled horns

description: You have a pair of long, pointed horns, like those of an antelope.  They allow you to make a strong piercing headbutt attack, but prevent wearing headwear that is not made of fabric.

attacks.attack_text_u: You stab %s with your pointed horns

description: You have a huge rack of antlers, like those of a moose.  They allow you to make a weak headbutt attack, but prevent wearing headwear that is not made of fabric.
You have a pair of antennae.  They allow you to detect the presence of monsters up to a few tiles away, even if you can't see or hear them, but prevent wearing headwear that is not made of fabric.
Your legs are extremely limber and fast-moving.  You move 30% faster on flat surfaces.
You have a short, stubby tail, like a rabbit's.  It serves no purpose.
You have a fin-like tail.  It allows you to swim more quickly, but prevents wearing non-fabric pants.  Slightly increases wet benefits.
You have a long, graceful tail, like that of a big cat.  It improves your balance, making your ability to dodge higher, but prevents wearing non-fabric pants.

You have a long tail with a tuft on the end.  You find yourself instinctively swatting away flies with it, though it's not as effective at balancing you as you'd like.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long but hairless tail.  It's a pretty effective balancing aid, but does look, uh, ratty.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long, thick, lizardlike tail.  It helps you balance a bit but also makes a serviceable whip.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long and semi-stiff lizardlike tail.  You can't effectively lash it in combat, but it significantly improves your balance.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long, fluffy-furred tail.  It greatly improves your balance, making your ability to dodge much higher.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long tail that ends in a vicious stinger.  It does not improve your balance at all, but allows for a powerful piercing attack.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long tail that ends in a heavy, bony club.  It does not improve your balance at all, but allows for a powerful bashing attack.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You've developed the ability to stockpile calories and then sleep for extended periods of time.
You can survive injuries that would incapacitate humans: you get a 20% bonus to all hit points.  Stacks with Tough, etc.
Not much scares you.  You get a 30% bonus to all hit points.  Stacks with Tough, etc.
You can simply take the punishment from lesser beings and keep going.  You get a 40% bonus to all hit points.  Stacks with Tough, etc.
You recover from pain slightly faster than normal.
You recover from pain faster than normal.
You recover from pain much faster than normal.
You've developed a serious appetite for pain, and take pride in your scars.
//: MASOCHIST_MED and NOPAIN don't cancel each other.  By design.  Poor painless folks...

description: You positively adore pain, in all its varied forms.
//: CENOBITE and NOPAIN also don't cancel each other.  By design.  Poor painless cenobites...

description: Nothing hurts any more.  Those bites tickle and the wounds itch a bit, but that's it.
//: MASOCHIST_MED, CENOBITE, and NOPAIN don't cancel each other.  By design.  Poor painless people...

description: For some reason things always seem to hurt you more.  Pain dealt to you is increased by 25%.
//: The MORE_PAIN mutations will always increase the pain you receive by at least 1.

description: Your body experiences pain out of proportion to the physical causes.  Pain dealt to you is increased by 50%.
Your body reacts cripplingly to any source of pain.  Pain dealt to you is doubled.

You've had a revelation: by killing the weaker creatures, who would only die anyway, you preserve resources for those better able to survive.  You are less bothered by the deaths of others: their own weakness invited these fates upon them.

Your brain has a lot more in common with a predatory animal than a human, making it easier to control misplaced reactions to the death of your prey.  Additionally, combat skills, which you use to hunt, are easier to learn and maintain.

You consider yourself something other than human and no longer empathize with them.  Combat skills are easy to learn and maintain, but your critical thinking, so characteristic to these creatures, suffers.

Your mind and brain have adapted to your new place in the world: as one on top of the food chain.  You can effortlessly master and maintain combat skills, but your critical thinking has atrophied further.
The hairless apes make as good eating as any other meat.

From time to time the Mycus requires protection from non-Mycus that, for whatever reason, wish it ill.  We have adapted to better carry out this task - our fibers will grow strong and resilient when such threats present themselves to us.

You have a pair of large, feathered wings.  Your body is too heavy to be able to fly, but you can use them to slow your descent during a fall, and will not take falling damage under any circumstances.
You have a pair of large, translucent wings.  They are too small to lift you, but are powerful enough to greatly speed your movement, with some effort and noise.
A set of tentacles surrounds your mouth.  They allow you to eat twice as fast.  Slightly decreases wet penalties.
A set of insect-like mandibles have grown around your mouth.  They allow you to eat faster and provide a slicing unarmed attack, but prevent wearing mouthwear.  Slightly reduces wet effects.
Your mandibles have developed extensible fangs, allowing you to bite quickly or ensure your venom goes home, as desired.
Your ears have extended into long, pointed ones, like those of a canine.  They enhance your hearing, allowing you to hear at greater distances.
Your hearing has evolved further and is now on par with wolves.  You can hear things significantly farther away.
Your ears have extended into long, pointed, velvety ones, like those of a feline.  You find it easier to tune in on sounds from afar.
Your ears have grown longer and rounder, much like those of a bear.  You can hear things a little farther away.
Your upper earlobes have grown noticeably higher.  Fortunately, they don't get in the way of your headgear, much.  Unfortunately, they also don't seem to help your hearing any.
Your ears are huge, round, and gray!  They're rather fascinating, and help you hear from a much greater distance.
Your body excretes very fine amounts of a chemical which prevents you from sticking to webs.  Walking through webs does not affect you at all.
Your body produces and anchors webbing.  Too bad you can't seem to control the process.  There is a chance that you will leave webs in your wake.
You've developed the necessary anatomy and techniques to control your web-generation.  Activate this to start or stop weaving webs.
Your webbing is easily strong enough to support your weight.  You'll use it to descend down any sheer drops you may encounter.
With spinnerets like THESE, who needs rope?!  Activate to produce rope.

spawn_item.message: You spin a rope from your silk.

description: You have a handsome set of feline whiskers around your mouth.  These make you more aware of vibrations in the air, and improve your ability to dodge very slightly.
You have a set of prominent rodent-like whiskers around your mouth.  These make you more aware of vibrations in the air, and improve your ability to dodge slightly.
You've put on some additional weight around your body.  It slows you down a little, but helps your swimming and warmth.
You have grown noticeably taller and broader.  Much of it is useful muscle mass (Strength +2), but you find it throws off your balance and you get in your own way (+10 torso and arm encumbrance).
You carry your rugged body with the dignity you deserve.  Strength +2.

You have grown even more massive, to the point where you cannot usefully fit into human-sized clothing or vehicles.  Much of it is powerful muscle mass (Strength +4), but it's a real pain to haul around.
Your cardiovascular system has caught up with your muscular physique, so who needs pathetic human cars?  Strength +4.
Your muscles are a little stronger.  Strength + 1
Your muscles are stronger.  Strength + 2
Your muscles are much stronger.  Strength + 4
Your muscles are noticeably bulging.  Strength + 7
Your muscles are perfectly developed.
You are a little nimbler.  Dexterity + 1
You are nimbler.  Dexterity + 2
You are nimble and quick.  Dexterity + 4
You are much nimbler than before.  Dexterity + 7
You're perfectly coordinated.
You are a little smarter.  Intelligence + 1
You are smarter.  Intelligence + 2
You are much smarter, and your skull bulges slightly.  Intelligence + 4
Your skull bulges noticeably due to your impressive brain.  Intelligence + 7
You understand almost everything about which you think, with minimal effort.
Your brain has evolved beyond human imagination.  You'll show them the REAL meaning of 'gray goo'!
Your senses are a little keener.  Perception + 1
Your senses are keener.  Perception + 2
Your senses are much keener.  Perception + 4
You can sense things you never imagined.  Perception + 7
Your senses are keenly honed.
Your sense organs are all over the place: eyes extending and retracting, 'ears' of various shapes migrating about, and taste & smell are uncontrollable.  The world is a horrible mixup.  Ugh!
You can now extend and reabsorb sensory organs at will, and can therefore ignore most shocks that would overwhelm lesser beings.
You've noticeably shrunk in size.  You're able to move with increased litheness, but your smaller stature prevents you from carrying as much.

You're only half as tall as you used to be!  The weight of things you once found easy to carry is now unbearable, clothes are now twice as encumbering for you unless you refit them (since you're half their size), and your hit points are heavily reduced.  However, your movement is silent, and your dodge skill is a little higher.
You've mastered your tiny form!  Item encumbrance and carry weight penalties are reduced, and you've learned to use your increased nimbleness to offset your reduced capacity to absorb damage.
By making the most of your small stature, you can avoid the notice of all but the most perceptive creatures, and your speed is greatly increased.

//: name courtesy of wiktionary's Greek for 'mutate'.  Greek-speakers, feel free to correct the term
description: Just thinking of mutagen (such a lovely word!  'Mutagen'.  Perfect!) makes you thirsty.  And you so love your new parts.  You simply must have more mutagen!
You have a pair of bumps on your skull.
You have a flattened nose and thin slits for nostrils, giving you a lizard-like appearance.  This makes breathing slightly difficult and increases mouth encumbrance by 10.
Your tongue is forked, like that of a reptile.  This has no effect.
Your eyes bulge out several inches from your skull.  This does not affect your vision in any way.
Skin tabs and odd flaps of skin surround your mouth.  They don't affect your eating, but are unpleasant to look at.
You have a pair of stubby little wings projecting from your shoulderblades.  They can be wiggled at will, but are useless.
You have a pair of large, leathery wings.  You can move them a little, but they are useless, and in fact put you off balance, reducing your ability to dodge slightly.
You have a very large and very beautiful pair of brightly-colored wings.  They can't lift you, and they make balancing tricky, but they certainly catch air and attention!
Your skin is rather pale.
Your skin is covered in a pattern of red spots.
You smell awful.  Monsters that track scent will find you very easily, and humans will react poorly.
You're slightly deformed.  Some people will react badly to your appearance.
You're hideously deformed.  Some people will have a strong negative reaction to your appearance.
Your visage is disgusting and liable to induce vomiting.  People will not want to interact with you unless they have a very good reason to.
You're a real head-turner.  Some people will react well to your appearance, and most people have an easier time trusting you.
You are a vision of beauty.  Some people will react very well to your looks, and most people will trust you immediately.
You are incredibly beautiful.  People cannot help themselves due to your charms, and will do whatever they can to please you.
Your face and jaw have begun… changing.  Masks and such fit OK, but you're noticeably mutated.
Your face resembles that of a bull, with a significant snout.  It looks fearsome but prevents wearing mouthgear.
Your jaw and nose have extended into a wolfish muzzle.  It lends itself to biting in combat and looks impressive, but prevents wearing mouthgear.
Your jaw and nose have extended into a bearish muzzle.  You could bite with it, and it looks impressive, but it prevents wearing mouthgear.
Your face and jaw have extended, giving you an alert and attentive appearance.
Your face and jaws are a shorter version of those found on alligators.  They look NASTY--as do the bite wounds they can inflict--but prevent wearing mouthgear.

attacks.attack_text_u: You bite a chunk out of %s

description: You've gotten rid of that terribly imprecise mouth and now imbibe your food like a proper person.  Chewing was tiresome anyway.

You have Avian Bone Syndrome--your bones are nearly hollow.  Your body is very light as a result, enabling you to move and attack 20% faster, but also frail; you can carry 40% less, and bashing attacks injure you more.
You feel nauseous almost constantly, and are more liable to throw up from food poisoning, alcohol, etc.  You can, if desired, think yourself into vomiting, too.
You have a major digestive disorder.  Though it causes you to vomit frequently, you have found that you can trigger your vomit reflex on demand, too.
You require more food than most people, but recover stamina slightly faster.
You require more resources than most, but heal more rapidly as well.  Provides weak regeneration even when not asleep.

You need about twice as much food as the average human to maintain your expanded cardiovascular and respiratory systems.  On a plus side, it doesn't take you much time to recover from any strenuous activity.
You consume three times as much food as the average human to maintain your truly superhuman endurance.
Your body dries out easily; you need to drink more water.
Ugh, out of water already?  You need about twice the fluids of an average human.
You dry out seriously quickly, requiring three times as much liquid to stay hydrated.
Your body gets everything it needs from the food that you eat!  You no longer gain hydration from fluids - instead, your thirst will be equal to, and change with, your hunger.
You could probably sleep through a firefight.
You find yourself needing to sleep quite often.  You'll spend about half of your time in or around bed.
You feel as though you are slowly weakening and your body heals slower.
Your body is very slowly wasting away.
Your body is slowly wasting away!
Your skin simply cannot handle ultraviolet radiation, such as sunlight.  It will seriously burn you.
Your extremities are covered in painful sores.  The pain is worse when they are covered in clothing.
Sunlight makes you uncomfortable.  If you are outdoors and the weather is Sunny, you suffer -1 to all stats.
Sunlight makes you very uncomfortable.  If you are outdoors during the day, you suffer -1 to all stats; -2 if the weather is Sunny.
Sunlight makes you extremely uncomfortable, resulting in large penalties to all stats.
Your hands and feet are heavily webbed, reducing your Dexterity by 1 and causing problems with gloves.  However, you can swim much faster.  Slightly decreases wet penalties.

Your hands have fused into quasi-paws.  Fine manipulation is a challenge: permanent hand encumbrance of 10, difficulty with delicate craftwork, and your gloves don't fit.  But they handle water better.
Your paws are much larger now.  Manual dexterity is difficult: permanent hand encumbrance of 20, serious problems crafting, and no gloves.  But you can swim more effectively.
You have a beak for a mouth.  You can occasionally use it to peck at your enemies, but it is impossible for you to wear mouth gear.  Slightly reduces wet effects.
Pecking at prey is part of your daily routine now.  Slightly reduces wet effects.

attacks.attack_text_u: You jackhammer into %s with your beak

description: Though your beak's not suitable for pecking, those flowers out there are a good source of energy.  Examine them to feed.
Your DNA has been damaged in a way that causes you to continually develop more mutations.
Your body alters itself rapidly, and without your intervention or conscious control.
Your body has become radioactive!  You continuously emit low levels of radiation, which slowly contaminates the world around you.
Your body has become radioactive!  You continuously emit moderate levels of radiation, which contaminates the world around you.
Your body has become radioactive!  You continuously emit heavy levels of radiation, making your surroundings unlivable.
Your body is coated with a fine slime.  Protects from long term effects of acid, though not short term ones.  Greatly increases wet benefits.
Your body's slime output has become sticky and gel-like.  Protects from acid somewhat.  Greatly increases wet benefits.
Your flesh is a pleasing gel-like consistency.  Your bodily functions seem to be moving around, and your leg-equivalents flow comfortably - if a little slower than your old meat-legs.
Your body is more or less one consistent whole: a single, giant, omni-cell that alters itself as needed.
Your body's ability to digest meat is severely hampered.  Eating meat has a good chance of making you vomit it back up; even if you manage to keep it down, its nutritional value is greatly reduced.
Your body's ability to digest fruits, vegetables, grains and nuts is severely hampered.  You cannot eat anything besides meat.
Your muscles are generally slow to move.  You move 10% slower.
Your muscles are quite slow to move.  You move 20% slower.
Your muscles are very slow to move.  You move 30% slower.
You feel very sluggish when not in direct sunlight.  You suffer a 5% drop in speed when in shade, and a 10% drop in speed when in the dark.
You have developed several vines sprouting from your shoulder area.  They're bulky and get in the way.
You've developed the ability to control your vines; they make good lashes.  You can even rappel down sheer drops using them, but disconnecting HURTS.
You have full control of your vines, and can grow new ones and detach old ones more or less at will.

spawn_item.message: You detach a vine from your body.

description: Roots have started growing from your leaf like hair, they don't seem to do much.
Your toes have grown wriggly, and you can't imagine why you wear that stuff on your feet.  Take it off.  It's in the way.

description.//~: The idea is that you, for lack of a better term, plant yourself.  Crafting and digging don't count because they presume a certain amount of movement during the task.  The handheld game does count.
description.str: It's about time you started developing a root system.  When reading, fishing, waiting, or otherwise being stationary for a while on diggable terrain, you'll extract nutrients and water from the soil.

description: You find it difficult not to sink roots when able.  You extract nutrients and water whenever on diggable terrain, but move more slowly.
Every inch of your skin is packed with chlorophyll and you have strong roots.  Sleeping on diggable soil will satisfy any hunger or thirst you might have.
You have gained the ability to commune with trees and comprehend their ancient wisdom.  Activate next to a tree to gradually gain overmap vision through connected forests.
Your muscle response is dependent on ambient temperatures.  You lose 1% of your speed for every 5 (2.8) degrees below 65 F (18.3 C).  This sluggishness helps you conserve energy, however.
Your muscle response is highly dependent on ambient temperatures.  You lose 1% of your speed for every 3 (1.7) degrees below 65 F (18.3 C), but your slow metabolism requires much less food.
You are cold-blooded and rely on heat to keep moving.  Your lose 1% of your speed for every 2 (1.1) degrees below 65 F (18.3 C), but only need to eat about half as much as before.
Your body has become permanently cold-blooded.  Your speed lowers or raises 1% for every 2 (1.1) degrees below or above 65 F (18.3 C).  You only need to eat half as much as an average human.
You have a growling, rough voice.  Persuading NPCs will be more difficult, but threatening them will be easier.
You have a threatening snarl in your voice.  Persuading NPCs will be near impossible, but threatening them will be much easier.
You hiss when speaking.  Persuading NPCs will be more difficult, but threatening them will be easier.
You occasionally shout uncontrollably.
You sometimes scream uncontrollably.
You frequently let out a piercing howl.
Your arms have grown vibrantly colored feathers.  They effectively waterproof your arms and take the edge off hits, but really get in the way.  They're simply too small to help you in the air.
You've *finally* sprouted a pair of arms from your midsection.  They flail more-or-less uncontrollably, making you feel rather larval.
It's good having all your arms.  Though they're too thin to block or punch, you can fold them inside human-shaped gear if need be.
There's the last two limbs you were expecting.  Unfortunately you still can't coordinate them, so you're getting in your own way.  A lot.
You have four handsome limbs, and then those mutant 'hand' and 'foot' things.  They probably aren't worth concealing.
Your arms have transformed into tentacles, resulting in a bonus of 1 to Dexterity, permanent hand encumbrance of 30, and inability to wear gloves.  Somewhat decreases wet penalties.

Your arms have transformed into four tentacles, resulting in a bonus of 1 to Dexterity, permanent hand encumbrance of 30, and inability to wear gloves.  You can make up to 3 extra attacks with them.  Somewhat decreases wet penalties.

Your arms have transformed into eight tentacles, resulting in a bonus of 1 to Dexterity, permanent hand encumbrance of 30, and inability to wear gloves.  You can make up to 7 extra attacks with them.  Somewhat decreases wet penalties.

You have grown a thick shell over your torso, providing excellent armor.  You find you can use the empty space as 16 storage space, but cannot wear anything on your torso.  Somewhat reduces wet effects.
Your protective shell has grown large enough to accommodate--if need be--your whole body.  Activate to pull your head and limbs into your shell, trading mobility and vision for warmth and shelter.
Your legs have transformed into six tentacles.  This decreases your speed on land by 20%, makes your movement silent, increases your swimming speed, and reduces wet penalties.
Your lower-tentacles have developed suckers.  They make land movement marginally more tiring, but do a good job of keeping you set in place.
You sometimes look back on your days before your tail came in.  But you're better now.
You're sure you'll fly someday.  In the meantime, there are still nests to build.
Ninety percent of the planet, and it's yours to explore.  And colonize.  And enjoy.  What was that about a surface?
It's about time you grew out.  Now that you've matured, it is time to make something of yourself.
Stalking prey, eating well, and lying in the sun.  Mmm, all you could ever desire.
You're the perfect candidate to lead a pack.
So the humans died, what's the worry?  Now they won't ruin the woods.
Civilization collapsed?  Great!  You and your kin will never have to worry about a slaughterhouse again.
It would be good to be a Queen, having workers constantly servicing your every need… but how would you keep them in line?
Well, you still have those other walking flowers-and the mushrooms too-to deal with.  But you'll manage.
What was that old advertisement, 'paint the planet'?  That might be a good long-term goal, but for now…
Not much point to rebuilding up in that horribly bright roofless wasteland.  Now that you've become accustomed to your new digs, there's the beginnings of a great empire right here, underground.
Strange aeons, true, but Death seems to be slacking and you are doing just fine.
Well, maybe you'll just have to make your own world wide web.
Hey.  Civilization fell.  You're still around.  'Rat' just isn't respectful.
After all those experiments, what's a few more, hmm?
You're the perfect candidate to tidy this mess.
You are the tree under which humankind will shelter during these dark times.
You can't tell what you are anymore.  Everything and yet nothing, like you weren't meant to exist.  But you do, and you're a force, no matter what happens.
The chance to undo not one but TWO extinction events.  You're confident you'll do fine.
So much food, everywhere!  And nobody's even guarding it anymore!  These are good times.
You get the feeling that you're on the cusp of becoming something greater than yourself.
We are the Mycus.
Your mutated flesh is immune to the damaging effects of acid.
Your body has developed a wonderful defense mechanism.  Instead of normal blood, you bleed a strong molecular acid which will damage any creature foolish enough to harm you.
You have an unhealthy obsession with fire, and you get anxious if you don't light them every now and then or stand near them often.  However, you gain a mood bonus from doing so.
You're as comfortable in water as on land, and your body has adapted around that fact.  Your base swimming speed is greatly increased, and weight will hinder you much less while swimming.

Like a true fish, your eyes lack eyelids, and are are instead covered by a translucent, protective membrane that blocks irritants and water, and provides minor armor.  It also allows you to sleep with your eyes open!  Activate to cause the approach of hostile creatures to wake you up.
Falling asleep underwater is easy for you, and you spend less time asleep when you rest there.  You can also eat underwater, though you can't drink.
Your flesh is highly poisonous, and creatures that bite you will receive a nasty surprise.
Your gills and skin are highly permeable to moisture, and you can hydrate your body through osmosis.  While submerged in fresh water, any thirst you might have will be slaked.

A network of jelly-filled electroreceptors, like that of a shark, have grown throughout your face and nose.  They are very sensitive to magnetic fields, allowing you to see robots and creatures charged with electricity through walls, but being shocked will seriously mess you up.

Your teeth have grown incredibly sharp and are formed of very dense calcium material.  In addition to making you eat much faster, you can use them as a lethal natural weapon, as long as your anatomy favors it.  They also grow very fast, and you harmlessly shed them more or less at random.

attacks.attack_text_u: You tear into %s with your teeth

description: You are a duly sworn law enforcement officer, with jurisdiction throughout the New England region thanks to interstate agreements.  Whether that means anything now is another question.

name: Helicopter Pilot
description: You are a trained helicopter pilot.  This makes you one of the few living people who can operate a helicopter after the Cataclysm.
You are a duly sworn law enforcer, with jurisdiction throughout the New England region thanks to interstate agreements.  Whether that means anything now is another question.

You are a cybernetically-resurrected law enforcer, with jurisdiction throughout the New England region thanks to interstate agreements.  Whether you can do for the law what the law did for you is another question.
Thou art a lewede man, a lowly cowherd, though where thi catel been thou hast not ynn certain.
You are a duly sworn law enforcement investigator, with jurisdiction throughout the New England region thanks to interstate agreements.  Whether your shield means anything now is another question.
You are a duly sworn Federal marshal, with nationwide jurisdiction and the authority of the United States of America.

You are the true Foodperson, some might think Foodperson is just a mascot, but you know better.  You are Foodperson, the mask has become your face, you are real and the only thing standing between this world and oblivion is you.

//: In the US, a medical 'residency' is essentially an extended post-graduate, on-the-job medical training.  The idea here is that hospital computer systems would recognize the PC as a valid user and grant access.
description: You were just through with the administrative formalities for your residency when the Cataclysm struck.  "Your" hospital was overrun and evacuated, but there's always work for a good doctor.
You are skilled in maneuvering on skates.  You suffer less dodging penalties and are less likely to fall down if hit in melee combat while you're wearing rollerskates or rollerblades.
You were shaping up to be a pretty decent student of the martial arts before the Cataclysm struck.  Time to see just how good you really are.
You were competitive at national levels, and had considered teaching your art.  Defending against the entire town may still be a challenge, though.
You are experienced in the Sweet Science of boxing.  You could've had a shot at a local boxing tournament, if the Cataclysm hadn't screwed that up.
You're trained in proper operation of the Autodoc, an advanced machine used for surgical procedures.  Operations involving it will be moderately more likely to succeed.

Weeks spent picking through manuals and researching topics you aren't versed in has taught you to find what you need to know more quickly.  You read slightly faster, and suffer no reading time penalty for books too complex for you to easily understand.
This Bartender now carries brandy!
This Bartender now carries rum!
This Bartender now carries whiskey!
New mission options have become available!
New options may have become available!
New options may have become available!
Marker for starting NPCs
Marker for static NPCs
NPC trait that makes them be hallucination.  It is a bug if you have it.
You can clearly see that this is for dev purposes only.
If you see this, you'd best be debugging something.
Holds hunger, thirst, and fatigue stable.  You can debug all year long with this one!
Smell that bug?  Smell's certainly not coming from you!
Be vewwy vewwy quiet.  We're hunting bugs.
Temperature and weather won't bug you.
Bug repellent forcefield.
Crafting and construction requirements bugger off with this one.  Apply with care.
Mind the bugs, would you kindly?
Lets you carry 15 bugs worth of your body weight in your mandibles.
Lets you instantly install torsion ratchets for your eight legs.
For fueling your inner cybug.  Activate to increase power capacity by 100 (can be repeated.)
Activate to increase power by an amount you specify (can be repeated).
You can't even think about putting filthy clothes on yourself, especially from zombies' corpses.
NPC trait that makes monsters see it as a bee.  It is a bug (heh) if you have it.
NPC trait that makes fungaloid monsters see this NPC as a friend.
NPC trait that makes it impossible to say anything.  It is a bug if you have it.
You're too adventurous for your own good.  The more time you spend somewhere, the unhappier it makes you to be there.
You can't bear to stay still for long.  Your morale will suffer unless you constantly explore new territory.
Spending any amount of time in familiar places makes you miserable.  Must.  Keep.  Moving.
Whether from personal choice or childhood trauma, traveling with vehicles is off-limits to you, even if your life depended on it.
You have fast reflexes, allowing you to dodge attacks more easily.
